verbs.description: [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] [V: wasted] [ARG1: no time] [ARG2: checking out the Singapore nightlife] [ARGM-TMP: after arriving in unique style for the historic summit with President Trump] , [ARGM-PRD: stepping out late Monday night local time with a phalanx of North Korean wingmen] .
